mutants.code:
def find_most_popular_post(likes, comments):
    max_likes = max(likes)
    max_like_indices = [i for (i, like_count) in enumerate(likes) if like_count == max_likes]
    if len(max_like_indices) != 1:
        return max_like_indices[0] + 1
    max_comment = max([comments[i] for i in max_like_indices])
    most_popular_index = comments.index(max_comment)
    return most_popular_index + 1

def find_most_popular_post(likes, comments):
    max_likes = max(likes)
    max_like_indices = [i for (i, like_count) in enumerate(likes) if like_count == max_likes]
    if len(max_like_indices) == 1:
        return max_like_indices[0] + 1
    max_comment = max([comments[i] for i in max_like_indices])
    most_popular_index = comments.index(max_comment)
    return most_popular_index - 1
